caption.p: Protective effects of the anti-CVA4 serum. The 3-day-old neonatal mice ( n = 10–15) were challenged with a lethal dose of YT226R. The neonatal mice with a clinical score of 1–2 were treated with the antisera diluted at a ratio of 1:1, 1:10, 1:100 and 1:1000 twice (Early stage treatment). Also, the neonatal mice with a clinical score of ≥3 were treated with the antisera twice (Late stage treatment).
